title: Cracks or controversy? Sepp Kuss surrenders time to Jonas Vingegaard but defends lead: ‘I don’t want to win as a gift’
content:
American climber cedes time to Jumbo-Visma teammate but downplays tension inside team bus: 'The strongest will win.'

Read the full article at Cracks or controversy? Sepp Kuss surrenders time to Jonas Vingegaard but defends lead: ‘I don’t want to win as a gift’ on Velo.
author: ahood
